name: Area V: Van Richten’s Tower
caption: Van Richten has returned, the old fool. He tries to hide from me, but I shall find him. He and I have much to discuss.
description: One of the men employed by Strahd to raise Castle Ravenloft was an archwizard named Khazan. After his work on the castle was complete, Khazan retired to the Barovian valley and built a tower for himself on a small island on Lake Baratok. With the help of some engineers and laborers, he also built an earth-and-gravel causeway connecting the island with the nearby shore.
